title: Charlemagne: medieval empire builder
itunes:title: Charlemagne: medieval empire builder
itunes:subtitle: Professor Dame Janet L Nelson talks about her major new biography of Charlemagne, the 8th-century king of the Franks who became one of medieval Europe’s most important and influential rulers. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Professor Dame Janet L Nelson discusses Charlemagne, the 8th-century king of the Franks who became one of medieval Europe’s most important rulers. Historyextra.com/podcast  

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
